content:
Hi, I'm h-nny

Repository Achievements

gitresume

  • Developed a modern web application leveraging Next.js for server-side rendering and efficient routing.
  • Implemented a robust build environment using Bun and utilized an optimized configuration ensuring faster build times.
  • Orchestrated styling and UI components with Tailwind CSS, resulting in a visually appealing and responsive user interface.
  • Utilized TypeScript to enforce strong typing and improve code maintainability and reduce errors.
  • Integrated environment variables for separate configurations in the development and production environments, ensuring consistent build and maintainability.

Carbon-Flutter

  • Engineered a robust Flutter boilerplate, significantly accelerating the development of new Flutter applications with a pre-configured MVVM architecture.
  • Designed and implemented a modular project structure within the boilerplate, promoting code reusability, maintainability, and scalability for complex applications.
  • Developed a PowerShell script to streamline the boilerplate installation process, reducing setup time and ensuring consistent project configurations for new developers.
  • Championed the adoption of best practices in Flutter development, including state management and UI design, which will save time and resources down the line.
  • Conceptualized and implemented the foundation for a complete application development framework to facilitate the creation of high-quality, production-ready Flutter applications.

Technical Skills
